title: Solar to reach up to 70% of Bulgaria's generation at times this spring
description: Solar energy could reach 60-70% of Bulgaria's total electricity generation during some parts of the day as early as this spring.

title: Bulgaria's 3 GWh standalone energy storage tender heavily oversubscribed
description: The Ministry of Energy of Bulgaria has received 151 project proposals worth nearly BGN 5 billion ($2.7 billion), more than four times the available funding.

title: Funding secured for 237.6 MW merchant solar plant in Bulgaria
description: According to figures from the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA), Bulgaria had deployed 2,937 MW of solar by the end of 2023.

title: Verila Project, Bulgaria's Largest Solar Power Plant
description: The Verila project, which is being built in hilly terrain south of Sofia, will increase solar power generation in the country by 12 percent.

title: IFC Supports Major Solar Power Project to Drive Bulgaria's Renewable Energy Goals
description: IFC is financing Rezolv Energy's solar PV plant in Silistra, Bulgaria. The project will significantly contribute to Bulgaria's 2050 net-zero goals.

title: Bulgaria launches tenders to add 1.43GW of renewables to grid
description: Bulgaria's Ministry of Energy has launched two tenders to add 1,425MW of renewable power generation to the grid and 350MW of battery energy storage.
